title: FULLY RENOVATED 1BD/1BA TOWNHOME
posting_body: ['We are minutes away from:', "The Mall at Southlake, Fayetteville Pavilion, Wal-Mart, Shanes Rib's Shack, Firehouse, Longhorn, Oliver Garden, Tuesday Morning, At Home", 'We offer quick and easy access to downtown Atlanta, The GA Aquarium, The Fox Theater, the Mercedes Benz Dome, Phillips Arena, and more.', 'Our one-bedroom / one-bath apartment Townhomes rent $1195 and 950 sq ft.', 'Our beautiful spacious two bedroom / 1.5 bath Townhomes rent $1395 and 1250 sq ft.', 'Our beautiful spacious three bedroom / 2.5 bath Townhomes rent $1587 and 1450 sq ft.', 'If you want to view our floor plans, you can visit <URL>).', 'COMMUNITY', '*Outdoor Swimming Pool', '*Community Events', '*On-site Maintenance', '*On-Site Management', '*Community Events', '*Electronic Rent Payment', '*Pet Friendly', 'AMENITIES', '*Newly Renovated Apartment Homes', '*Townhomes Available', '*Newly Renovated Apartments', '*Washer & Dryer Connections only in 2Bedrooms and 3Bedrooms', 'Pricing changes daily!', 'Our Fees consist of:', '* Application fee - $65.00', '* Administrative fee $200.00', '* Security Deposit- One month of rent', 'Our qualifications are the following:', '• Household income must be three times the rent (gross).', '• No pending or dismissed bankruptcies (If discharged, it must be at least seven years old).', '• No eviction or landlord debt.', '• No felonies.', '• 600 credit score.', 'Hurry, prices and availability are subject to change every day!', 'Call today so we can set an appointment to discuss your Move-in date!', 'Our office hours are Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 5 PM.', 'Saturday 10 AM to 2 PM.', 'We are open for walk-ins but no more than two people at a time.', 'It is required to wear a mask during your visit.', 'Thank You, and Welcome Home!']
